title: Keys for Hextech Chest
body: Hello, i don't know if here's the good place to ask this, but we won't get Keys to open our chests anymore? thank you.{{champion:37}}

replies.body:
I checked up on your account and it does look like you've been getting key fragments recently. Keep in mind there are limits to how many you can get in a 4-week period.

https://i.gyazo.com/47861a0f4792538a7299995f22591a1e.png
